name: Swifty Pixels
description:
Listen to swift melodies as you swipe to dodge obstacles and compete for high scores. Swifty Pixels is a simple yet elegantly designed, musical arcade hit that has the player swiping shapes around obstacles to achieve supremacy in the leaderboards. Throw on some headphones, pump up the volume, and stretch your thumbs.

Features:
*Simple gameplay: swipe to dodge obstacles
*Original soundtrack: improv jazz tracks on each level
*Leaderboards: compete for high scores
